docs.snippet: Sixteen of the twenty-one American republics were represented at the second international conference on American history which opened here today for a ten-day session. Only Costa Rica, Cuba, Haiti, Honduras and El Salvador were not represented.
docs.lead_paragraph: Sixteen of the twenty-one American republics were represented at the second international conference on American history which opened here today for a ten-day session. Only Costa Rica, Cuba, Haiti, Honduras and El Salvador were not represented.
docs.abstract: Internatl conf on Amer history opens, Buenos Aires

headline.main: HISTORIANS OPEN SESSION; Sixteen of 21 American Republics Represented in Buenos Aires

docs.snippet: Luis Manuel Debayle, Foreign Minister of Nicaragua, began today a series of conferences with Federal officials here looking toward reorganization of Nicaragua's financial systern and the clarification of several collateral economic problems.
docs.lead_paragraph: Luis Manuel Debayle, Foreign Minister of Nicaragua, began today a series of conferences with Federal officials here looking toward reorganization of Nicaragua's financial systern and the clarification of several collateral economic problems.
